name: Cannon Shooter (JalfeDev)
description:
Use your mouse to point at the bombs and click to shoot, and simple game for a Jam.

Hello! I always wanted to enter a Jam and this is my first time making a game in such a short time, so, I hope you enjoy it.

I coudln't implement the LootLocker Account because my Game Maker didn't support it. It may be my last Game Maker project, but I'm not sad. It was my first programming language and I made the most of it, so now I plan to expand my horizons with more languages. I hope you do well and thanks for reading this long text.
